mapper.sql: id, user_id, task_id, session_name, start_time, end_time, focus_duration, break_duration, efficiency_score, notes, mood, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM study_log WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT FROM study_log WHERE task_id = #{taskId} ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT FROM study_log WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND DATE(start_time) = CURDATE() ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT FROM study_log WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND YEARWEEK(start_time, 1) = YEARWEEK(CURDATE(), 1) ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT FROM study_log WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND YEAR(start_time) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(start_time) = MONTH(CURDATE()) ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(focus_duration), 0) FROM study_log WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND DATE(start_time) = CURDATE()
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(focus_duration), 0) FROM study_log WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND YEARWEEK(start_time, 1) = YEARWEEK(CURDATE(), 1)
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(focus_duration), 0) FROM study_log WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND YEAR(start_time) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(start_time) = MONTH(CURDATE())

SELECT COUNT(*) as total_sessions, COALESCE(SUM(focus_duration), 0) as total_focus_time, COALESCE(AVG(efficiency_score), 0) as avg_efficiency, COALESCE(AVG(mood), 0) as avg_mood FROM study_log WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(start_time)) as consecutive_days FROM study_log WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND start_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) ORDER BY start_time DESC

SELECT HOUR(start_time) as study_hour, COUNT(*) as session_count, AVG(focus_duration) as avg_duration FROM study_log WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND start_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) GROUP BY HOUR(start_time) ORDER BY session_count DESC
